text.section: Whenever the Commissioner considers it advisable, the Commissioner may examine the affairs, transactions, accounts, records, and assets of a discount medical plan organization or discount drug plan organization.
The examination shall be conducted in accordance with § 2-207 of this article.
The expense of the examination shall be paid in accordance with § 2-208 of this article.
The reports of the examination and investigation shall be issued in accordance with § 2-209 of this article.
